mapper.update: update act_ru_task set PROC_DEF_ID_ = #{procDefId} where PROC_DEF_ID_ in (select id_ from act_re_procdef where key_ = #{key} and version_ < #{version})
update act_ru_execution set PROC_DEF_ID_ = #{procDefId} where PROC_DEF_ID_ in (select id_ from act_re_procdef where key_ = #{key} and version_ < #{version})
update act_ru_job set PROC_DEF_ID_ = #{procDefId} where PROC_DEF_ID_ in (select id_ from act_re_procdef where key_ = #{key} and version_ < #{version})
update act_ru_identitylink set PROC_DEF_ID_ = #{procDefId} where PROC_DEF_ID_ in (select id_ from act_re_procdef where key_ = #{key} and version_ < #{version})
